doc.title: Chick Flick
doc.plot: Hollywood hopefuls SYD and JOEY are just two gals awaiting their lucky break, serving drinks at a posh Beverly Hills hotel. When the producer who screwed Joey comes into the bar flanked by two dangerous debt collectors, Syd decides it's time for a career move. A little PMS and a big gun is all it takes to flee their day jobs in a stolen hearse with a hostage and a bounty on their heads. Things turn violently funny when they try to get to a Tijuana bullfight to pitch themselves to a studio exec. Had Thelma and Louise been more career orientated, they wouldn't have driven off that cliff...
